'''''Amon Hen'' 49''' is the forty-ninth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published on 10 March [[1981]].

==Contents==
* Cover - ''Untitled
** By: Urban Gunnarsson
* Editorial/Contents
** By: [[Brin Dunsire]]
* AGM & Dinner
* Library/Mailing/Back Issues
* Who was Gothmog?
** By: [[John D. Rateliff|John Rateliff]]
* Forodrim 9th Year Feast
* On the Heights
** By: Tim Scratcherd
* Review: Hawk the Slayer
** By: M. Towers
* New Tolkien Newsletter/Mosaic
** By: Jessica Yates
* Review: Wounded Land
** By: B. Conroy and Rachel Hawes
* Smial Please
* Tolk Folk & Cartoon
* Church House Report/Lincoln
* Letters
* Helen's Heep/Neldoreth
** By: [[Helen Armstrong]]
* Brin's Bundle
** By: [[Brin Dunsire]]
